name: HpiLocationLM
purpose: The Location resource used by the HPI service
description: The Location resource used by the HPI service
title: HpiLocationLM

element.definition: A place where healthcare services are provided.

element.label: hpiFacilityID
element.definition: The HPI FacilityID is a unique 8 character identifier assigned by the HPI system to an individual facility.

element.label: dormantFaciltyId
element.definition: Other HPI-FacilityIDs assigned to this location by mistake in the past

element.label: otherIdentifier
element.short: Unique code or number identifying the location to its users
element.definition: Identifiers assigned to health facilities by a system other than the HPI.  These are unique within their source system.

element.label: status
element.definition: Indicates if the facility is no longer operating.

element.label: name
element.short: Name of the location as used by humans
element.definition: Name of the location as recognized by healthcare service users. May not be unique.

element.label: alias
element.short: A list of alternate names that the location is known as, or was known as in the past
element.definition: A list of alternate names that the location is known as, or was known as in the past.

element.label: type
element.definition: Indicates the type of alias name
element.comment: This is an extension on alias. Note that the representation in json is an array with the name _alias that has the extension values in the same order as the array of aliases...

element.label: description
element.short: Additional details about the location that could be displayed as further information to identify the location beyond its name
element.definition: Description of the Location, which helps in finding or referencing the place.

element.label: type
element.definition: Indicates the type of function performed at the location.
element.comment: the existing HPI Facility Type codeset

element.label: telecom
element.definition: The contact details of communication devices available at the location. This can include phone numbers, fax numbers, mobile numbers, email addresses and web sites.

element.label: address
element.definition: Physical location.

element.label: managingOrganization
element.short: Organization responsible for provisioning and upkeep
element.definition: The organization responsible for the provisioning and upkeep of the location.

element.label: partOf
element.short: Another Location this one is physically part of
element.definition: Another Location which this Location is physically part of.

element.label: endpoint
element.short: Technical endpoints providing access to services operated for the location
element.definition: Technical endpoints providing access to services operated for the location.

element.label: established
element.definition: The period over which the location is open
element.comment: It's a period rather than an 'opened date' as locations that are closed can be returned (I guess)

element.label: DHB
element.definition: The District Health Board where this facility is located

element.label: nzGeoCode
element.definition: The new zealand geocode. This uses a different datum from that defined in the spec for the geocode, so is an extension rather than using the element in the spec. see discussion at https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/179166-implementers/topic/geocode.20extension

element.label: latitude
element.definition: No description

element.label: longitude
element.definition: No description
